aboutUs.p1: PT Rifan Financindo Berjangka is an official and registered futures brokerage company under the supervision of the Commodity Futures Trading Regulatory Agency (BAPPEBTI), the Financial Services Authority (OJK), and Bank Indonesia (BI). With over two decades of experience, we have become one of the key players in the Commodity Futures Trading industry in Indonesia.
aboutUs.p2:
As a member of PT Bursa Berjangka Jakarta (Jakarta Futures Exchange/JFX) and PT Kliring Berjangka Indonesia (KBI), PT Rifan Financindo Berjangka ensures integrity, security, and financial reliability in every transaction made by our clients.

We are committed to conducting Futures Trading activities in a regular, fair, effective, and transparent manner, in accordance with the prevailing laws and regulations. This commitment forms the foundation of our efforts to provide certainty and comfort for all related parties.

visi: To become the leading company in the Commodity Futures Trading industry in Indonesia.
To implement Good Corporate Governance (GCG) principles in all operational activities as a futures broker, while upholding the values of fairness and legal certainty for all parties involved.
misi: Enhance public literacy and education by collaborating with authorities, exchanges, and clearing institutions through various media, seminars, and other educational activities.
Improve the competence of Futures Broker Representatives through internal and external training to enhance professionalism and competitiveness.
Implement strict standard operating procedures, particularly in the client onboarding process, to maintain integrity and service quality.

whyChooseUs.title: Legal Certainty
whyChooseUs.description: PT Rifan Financindo Berjangka is an officially registered company supervised by BAPPEBTI, OJK, and Bank Indonesia. All traded products are listed on the Jakarta Futures Exchange (JFX), while client funds are placed in Segregated Accounts and deposited with the Indonesian Derivatives Clearing House (KBI) as transaction guarantees.

whyChooseUs.title: Online Registration Facility
whyChooseUs.description: The registration process can be done anytime and anywhere online through our official website www.rf-berjangka.com.

whyChooseUs.title: Online Trading & Demo Account Facility
whyChooseUs.description: Clients can trade anytime and anywhere during trading hours. A demo account is also provided for simulation before making real transactions.

whyChooseUs.title: Daily Transaction Reports
whyChooseUs.description: Clients receive daily reports including transaction recaps, equity positions, and open positions. Clients can also monitor transactions in real-time through the Temporary Statement in their real account.

whyChooseUs.title: Fund Security
whyChooseUs.description: Client funds are stored in Segregated Accounts, separate from company assets, and are only used for transaction purposes according to client instructions.

whyChooseUs.title: Fast Fund Withdrawal
whyChooseUs.description: Withdrawal requests can be submitted online through the withdrawal feature and are processed with a T+1 settlement time.

whyChooseUs.title: Certified Futures Broker Representatives
whyChooseUs.description: All our Futures Broker Representatives have obtained competency certification from the Commodity Futures Trading Professional Certification Institute (LSP PBK) which is nationally recognized. They work with integrity and professionalism to provide the best service to clients.

whyChooseUs.title: News and Analysis Portal
whyChooseUs.description: The news portal www.rfbnews.com is available 24/7 as a source of market research and analysis that can be used as a consideration in trading.

whyChooseUs.title: SITNa (Customer Transaction Information System)
whyChooseUs.description: Through the SITNa application, clients can monitor transaction transparency and ensure all activities are recorded and registered with the clearing institution.
